CustomField.description: Displays funnel date for current stage in the funnel. Used for report filters.
CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Non Opt-In (Illegal)" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Existing Opportunity" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Unable to Connect" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "On Hold" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Customer" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Opportunity Lost" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Disqualified" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - No Action Required" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Existing Opportunity" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Merged" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Already Engaged" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Deleted" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Lost" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Won" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Unmapped" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Legacy" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Default" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Not a Response")),NULL , IF( FCRM__FCR_SQR__c = TRUE, FCRM__FCR_SQR_Date__c, IF( CFCR_SCL__c = TRUE, CFCR_SCL_Date__c, IF( FCRM__FCR_SAR__c = TRUE, FCRM__FCR_SAR_Date__c , IF( FCRM__FCR_QR__c = TRUE, FCRM__FCR_QR_Date__c , IF( FCRM__FCR_Inquiry_Target__c = TRUE, FCRM__FCR_Inquiry_Target_Date__c , NULL ) )))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays funnel date for current stage in the funnel. Used for report filters.
CustomField.label: Current Stage In Funnel Date
